name: Curses and Coconuts
description:
You are stranded on a small cursed island in the sea and must defend yourself from skeletons which are rising from the sand below you!

This Game was made in 72 hours for the Ludum Dare - 38 Gamejam.

Controls: Move with the [CURSOR] keys or [WASD].

Attack with [SPACE] or [MOUSEBUTTONS]
